item.title: Basics
item.description: In this lab, you will learn how to: ☐ Access metrics information produced by each cAdvisor in each Kubelet

item.title: First Kubernetes Application
item.description: This lab takes you through the basics of deploying an application on Kubernetes.

item.title: Kubectl CLI Plugin Development
item.description: This lab takes you through the introductory steps for developing a kubectl plugin.

item.title: Kubectl CLI Plugins
item.description: The Kubectl command-line tool can be extended with plugins. These useful plugins are mostly underutilized by the community.

item.title: Kubernetes API
item.description: This lab takes you through the basics of accessing and exploring the Kubernetes API.
